body_html:
I had the same issue with optimize_for_inference, commenting out the following lines
from tensorflow.python.estimator import api as estimator_api # pylint: disable=g-import-not-at-top __path__ += [os.path.dirname(estimator_api.__file__)] del estimator_api from the top of this file (inside try..except block)
bazel-bin/tensorflow/python/tools/optimize_for_inference.runfiles/org_tensorflow/tensorflow/__init__.py seems to solve it though getting some official comments would be great
body:
I had the same issue with optimize_for_inference, commenting out the following lines
`from tensorflow.python.estimator import api as estimator_api  # pylint: disable=g-import-not-at-top  
__path__ += [os.path.dirname(estimator_api.__file__)]  
del estimator_api` from the top of this file (inside `try..except` block)
`bazel-bin/tensorflow/python/tools/optimize_for_inference.runfiles/org_tensorflow/tensorflow/__init__.py` seems to solve it though getting some official comments would be great
